meanings.definition: A type of wooden boat commonly found in Kashmir, India.
meanings.sent1: The shikaras gently glided on the serene lake.
meanings.sent2: Tourists enjoy riding shikaras to explore the beautiful scenery.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous ducks tried to hop onto the shikaras for a free ride.
meanings.sent4: The shikaras, like graceful swans, floated effortlessly on the water.
meanings.sent5: The colorful shikaras painted a vibrant picture against the backdrop of the mountains.
